title: Bug 18182BooleanFieldEditor gets out of synch after restoring defaults
OB: Bug 18182BooleanFieldEditor gets out of synch after restoring defaults Build 20020528The boolean field editor does not send the property changed event after "RestoreDefaults" is pressed on a preference page.This is because the editor keeps the state of the last value (field wasSelected)which is not updated when the defaults are restored.
